org.apache.oodt.cas.pge

Class WinPGETaskInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.oodt.cas.pge.PGETaskInstance
      • org.apache.oodt.cas.pge.WinPGETaskInstance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorkflowTaskInstance

    public class WinPGETaskInstance
extends PGETaskInstance
    Runs a CAS-style Product Generation Executive based on the PCS Wrapper Architecture from mattmann et al. on OCO specifically on a Windows Cygwin-running machine
    Author:
    riverma (Rishi Verma)
